faqs.question: What documents are required for maritime training?
faqs.answer: Required documents include 10+2 certificate, Aadhaar, PAN card, medical fitness certificate from DGS-approved doctors, passport (if planning foreign service), and character certificate from school/college.

faqs.question: What are the medical fitness standards?
faqs.answer: Medical fitness as per DGS norms includes eye vision 6/6 (correctable), hearing capacity, height minimum 157cm for deck officers, no color blindness, mentally fit, and free from contagious diseases.
